code: import{ADD_FAV,REMOVE_FAV,FILTER,ORDER}from"./action-types";export var addFav=function addFav(character){return{type:ADD_FAV,payload:character};};export var removeFav=function removeFav(id){return{type:REMOVE_FAV,payload:id};};export var filterCards=function filterCards(gender){return{type:FILTER,payload:gender};};export var orderCards=function orderCards(order){return{type:ORDER,payload:order};};
